name: Outward System Trauma
description:
The game has you playing as multiple entities, all in unison, all across different universes. 

FEATURES

  • 10 unique rooms to explore
  • 2 playable characters
  • 2 boss battles
  • 5-bit color customization (3 foreground and 2 background)
  • 3 unique events
  • All or Nothing mode (All Rooms, All Events, All Random, All at once!)
  • Unique music tracks composed by Cassy Prime (@CassyDaBean)
